name: Project
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project
description:
Project

The project is a top level container for resources including Cloud DNS ManagedZones. Projects can be created only in the Google Developers Console.

See Google::Cloud#dns

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dns"

dns = Google::Cloud::Dns.new
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
zone.records.each do |record|
  puts record.name
end

methods.name: project
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#project
methods.description: The unique ID string for the current project.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dns"

dns = Google::Cloud::Dns.new(
        project: "my-project-id",
        keyfile: "/path/to/keyfile.json"
)

dns.project #=> "my-project-id"

methods.name: zones_quota
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#zones_quota
methods.description: Maximum allowed number of zones in the project.

methods.name: data_per_record
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#data_per_record
methods.description: Maximum allowed number of data entries per record.

methods.name: additions_per_change
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#additions_per_change
methods.description: Maximum allowed number of records to add per change.

methods.name: deletions_per_change
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#deletions_per_change
methods.description: Maximum allowed number of records to delete per change.

methods.name: records_per_zone
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#records_per_zone
methods.description: Maximum allowed number of records per zone in the project.

methods.name: total_data_per_change
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#total_data_per_change
methods.description: Maximum allowed total bytes size for all the data in one change.

methods.name: zone
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#zone
methods.description: Retrieves an existing zone by name or id.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dns"

dns = Google::Cloud::Dns.new
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
puts zone.name

params.name: zone_id
params.description: The name or id of a zone.

returns.description: Returns nil if the zone does not exist.

methods.name: zones
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#zones
methods.description:
Retrieves the list of zones belonging to the project.

Google::Cloud::Dns::Zone::List)

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dns"

dns = Google::Cloud::Dns.new
zones = dns.zones
zones.each do |zone|
  puts zone.name
end

examples.caption: Retrieve all zones: (See Zone::List#all)
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dns"

dns = Google::Cloud::Dns.new
zones = dns.zones
zones.all do |zone|
  puts zone.name
end

params.name: token
params.description:
A previously-returned page token representing
part of the larger set of results to view.

params.name: max
params.description: Maximum number of zones to return.

params.name: zone_name
params.description:
User assigned name for this resource. Must
be unique within the project. The name must be 1-32 characters long,
must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and only
contain lowercase letters, digits or dashes.

params.name: zone_dns
params.description:
The DNS name of this managed zone, for
instance “example.com.”.

params.name: description
params.description:
A string of at most 1024 characters
associated with this resource for the user’s convenience. Has no
effect on the managed zone’s function.

params.name: name_server_set
params.description:
A NameServerSet is a set of DNS name
servers that all host the same ManagedZones. Most users will leave
this field unset.

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Project#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the change with updated status from the DNS service.
